Verses: 1 avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Un Kaaloondri Nil; Unnudane Pesuven Endraar.
2 ippadi Avar Ennode Pesumpodhu, Aavi Enakkul Vandhu, Ennaik Kaaloondri Nirkumpadi Seydhadhu; Appozhudhu Avar Ennudane Pesugiradhaik Ketten.

3 avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbina Kalagakkaara Jaadhiyaagiya Isravel Puththiraridaththirku Naan Unnai Anuppugiren; Avargalum Avargal Pidhaakkalum Innaalvaraikkum Enakku Virodhamaaith Dhrogancheydhaargal.
4 avargal Kadinamugamum Murattaatta Irudhayamumulla Puththirar; Avargalidaththirku Naan Unnai Anuppugindren; Karththaraagiya Aandavar Inninnadhai Uraikkiraar Endru Avargalode Sollu.
5 kalagaveettaaragiya Avargal Kettaalum Sari, Kelaavittaalum Sari, Thangalukkulle Oru Theerkkadharisi Undengiradhai Avargal Ariyavendum.

6 manupuththirane; Nee Avargalukku Bayappadavendaam; Avargal Vaarththaigalukkum Anjavendaam; Nerinjilgalukkullum Mullugalukkullum Nee Thangiyirundhaalum, Nee Avargal Vaarththaigalukku Bayappadaamalum Avargal Mugaththukkuk Kalangaamalumiru; Avargal Kalagaveettaar.
7 kalagakkaararaagiya Avargal Kettaalum Sari, Kelaavittaalum Sari, Nee En Vaarththaigalai Avargalukku Sollu.
8 manupuththirane, Nee Andhak Kalagaveettaaraippolak Kalagakkaaranaayiraamal, Naan Unnode Sollugiradhaik Kel; Un Vaayaith Thirandhu Naan Unakkuk Kodukkiradhaip Pusi Endraar.
9 appozhudhu Idho, Ennidaththirku Neettappatta Oru Kaiyaik Kanden; Andhak Kaiyile Oru Pusthaga Surul Irundhadhu.
10 avar Adhai Enakkumunbaaga Viriththaar; Adhil Ullum Purambum Ezhudhappattirundhadhu; Adhile Pulambalgalum, Thavippum, Aiyo Enbadhum Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.
